articles.author: Jeremy Gorner
articles.title: Chicago police seek answers in slaying of father of 3, killed after attending rock concert
articles.description: Adam Furtick was out with two of his friends on the night of Oct. 8 enjoying the classic rock band UFO perform at Chicago’s Concord Music Hall on North Milwaukee Avenue. A father of three and an avid rock and metal music fan, the 34-year-old Furtick was later…

articles.author: Greg Trotter
articles.title: Farm on Ogden aims to bring fresh produce and jobs to troubled North Lawndale
articles.description: A new urban farm is poised to open in the heart of North Lawndale, one of Chicago’s most violent and impoverished West Side communities. The Farm on Ogden — a unique partnership between the Lawndale Christian Health Center and Chicago Botanic Garden — aims to…
